All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivateCharacterCardMessage
The ActivateCharacterCardMessage record models the message to activate a character card
ActivateEffectController
 
AddPlayerMessage
The AddPlayerMessage record is the message sent to the server to add a player in the game
ApplyCharacterCardEffectMessage1
The ApplyCharacterCardEffectMessage record models the message to activate the effect of an active card on a chosen island
ApplyCharacterCardEffectMessage2
The ApplyCharacterCardEffectMessage2 record models the message to activate the effect of an active card on a chosen island
AvailableGamesMessage
The AvailableGamesMessage record is the message sent by the server to communicate the different games that can be opened or joined by the player
Bag
The Bag class models the game's bag from which the students are drawn
Card
The Card class is an enumeration with the list of the assistant cards of the game and their constants
Chamber
The Chamber class models the chamber of the school board, with the students, professors and coins and the methods needed for their management
ChamberData
the record contains all the data of a chamber
CharacterCard
The CharacterCard abstract class models the character cards of the game and their effects
CharacterCardCreator
The CharacterCardCreator class contains the method needed to create CharacterCard objects with the correct concrete subclass
CharacterCardData
contains all the data of a specific character card
CharacterID
The CharacterID is an enumeration with the list of the game's characters and their initial cost as a constant
CharactersController
This class is used to manage the character's Scene.
ChosenCardMessage
The ChosenCardMessage record models a message to choose a card
ChosenCloudMessage
The ChosenCloudMessage record models a message to choose a cloud
Clan
The Clan class is an enumeration of the different types and colors of the students and the professors
CLI
The CLI class contains the necessary methods needed to play to Eriantys with the Command Line Interface
CliCommandConstants
The CliCommandConstants contains the textual commands needed to play to Eriantys with the CLI
Client
The class Client contains a main method that launches the CLI or the GUI of the game according to the given argument
ClientHandler
The class ClientHandler handles the connection, the pings and the communication with a client
CliGraphicConstants
The CliGraphicConstants contains the important constants for the graphical part of the CLI
Cloud
The Cloud class models the clouds of the game, with the attributes and the methods needed for their management
CloudController
CloudController displays the Clouds on GUI
CloudData
contains all the data of a cloud
CloudManager
The CloudManager class manages the clouds of the game and their filling
CloudManagerData
contains the data of the clouds in the game
CommandParser
The CommandParser class contains the necessary methods to parse the commands inserted by a user playing with the cli and convert them in the corresponding messages
ConnectionConstants
The ConnectionConstants class contains the necessary constants to establish and maintain the connection between the server and the clients
ConnectionController
The class ConnectionController handles the events from the scene connection.fxml
Controller
The abstract class Controller manages all actions performed on a game by the clients and creates the game related messages that will be sent to them
Deck
The Deck class models the deck of the assistant cards of the game
DeckController
Class DeckController is the class responsible for managing the deck.fxml file
DisconnectionController
The class DisconnectionController handles the disconnection.fxml file that corresponds to the disconnection page that appears when another player has disconnected.
EndTurnMessage
The EndTurnMessage record models the message that notify the end of a player's turn
Eriantys
The class Eriantys is the main class of the game, from which both the client and the server are opened
ErrorMessage
The ErrorMessage record models an error message sent from the server to the clients
ExpertModeNotEnabledException
The ExpertModeNotEnabledException is thrown when trying to access to expert mode functionalities in a non-expert game
Game
The Game class contains the main logic of the game Eriantys with the necessary methods for the handling of its phases, initialization and winners determination included
GameBoardController
GameBoardController displays a concise view of the GameBoard on GUI
GameConstants
The GameConstants class contains the main constants used in the Erianys game
GameData
contains all the data of the game
GameInterface
The GameInterface interface contains all the necessary methods to play that, when called, bring a game from one valid state to another valid state
GameMessage
The GameMessage interface contains the method that performs a move on the game, and it is implemented by all game related messages
GameOverController
 
GameOverMessage
The GameOverMessage record models the message announcing the winners of the game
GamePhaseData
contains the information about the phase of the game
GameSelectionController
GameSelectionController displays the scene where the client can choose which game to play on GUI
GameStartedMessage
The GameStartedMessage record is the message that notifies the start of the game.
GameState
The GameState class is an enumeration with the list of the different stages of the game
GenericMessage
The GenericMessage class models a generic message that cannot be categorized in the other categories
GUI
GUI is the class that manages the Graphical User Interface of Eriantys
GuiConstants
GuiConstants contains the important constants for the GUI
Hall
The Hall class models the hall of the school board with its students
HallData
contains the information of the hall
InfluenceCharacterCard
The InfluenceCharacterCard class models the character cards that have an impact on the calculus of the influence of an island
Island
The Island class models the islands of the game, with the attributes and the methods needed for their management and merging
IslandData
contains the information of an Island
IslandManager
The IslandManager class manages the islands of the game, the position of Mother Nature and the merging of islands
IslandManagerData
contains the information about all the islands in the game and the position of mother nature
IslandsPageController
IslandsPageController displays all of the Islands from the Game Board on GUI
Lobby
The Lobby class is a singleton that manages the creation of new ClientHandlers, new Controllers and new Games.
Message
The Message interface will be implemented by all classes whose objects will be exchanged through the network
ModelDisplay
 
MoveMotherNatureMessage
The MoveMotherNatureMessage record models a message to move mother nature on a chosen island
MoveStudentToChamberMessage
The MoveStudentToChamberMessage record models a message to move a student in the chamber
MoveStudentToIslandMessage
The MoveStudentToIslandMessage record models a message to move a student on a chosen island
NewGameController
The NewGameController class is the concrete implementation of the abstract class Controller for the newly created games
NewGameMessage
The NewGameMessage record models the message for asking the server to create a new game with the given parameters
NicknameAcceptedMessage
The NicknameAcceptedMessage record is the message sent by the server to a client when the nickname chosen by the client has been accepted
NicknameMessage
The NicknameMessage record is sent by the client to the server and contains the nickname chosen by the player
NicknameNotAvailableException
The NicknameNotAvailableException is thrown when trying to add a Player with a nickname already used by another one
NonExistingPlayerException
The NonExistingPlayerException is thrown when a move with a nickname not owned by any player in the game is invoked
NotValidIndexException
The NotValidIndexException is thrown when an incorrect index is provided when trying to make a move
NotValidMoveException
The NotValidMoveException is thrown when the current player tries to make any move not legal accordingly with the game rules
NumberOfPlayerNotSupportedException
The NumberOfPlayerNotSupportedException is thrown when trying to create a Game with a number of player not supported
OpeningNewGameData
The OpeningNewGameData class is a record that contains all the data that represent an opening new game
OpeningRestoredGameData
The OpeningRestoredGameData class is a record that contains all the data that represent an opening restored game
PageController
The class PageController is an abstract class which all the controllers of the GUI extend.
Player
The Player class models the player of the game Eriantys with its nickname, its school board and its deck of assistant cards
PlayerAddedToGameMessage
The PlayerAddedToGameMessage class models the message that confirms that a player has been added to the game
PlayerData
contains all the data of the player
PlayerDisconnectedMessage
The PlayerDisconnectedMessage record models the message that notifies that a player has disconnected
ProfessorsCharacterCard
The ProfessorsCharacterCard class models the character cards that have an impact on the rules that govern the ownership of the professors
ProhibitionCharacterCard
The ProhibitionCharacterCard class models the character cards whose effect is to add prohibition cards on islands
RestoredGameController
The RestoredGameController class is the concrete implementation of the abstract class Controller for the previously saved games restored from file
RestoreGameMessage
The RestoreGameMessage record is sent by a client for asking the server to restore a previously saved game
SavedGameData
The SavedGameData class is a record that contains all the data that represent a saved game
SavedGameManager
The SavedGameManager class contains all static methods needed to save and restore games
SchoolBoardController
SchoolBoardController displays the players's School Boards on GUI
Server
The class Server listens to the port given as argument and creates new sockets for the clients that connect to it
ServerHandler
The class ServerHandler handles the connection, the pings and the communication with the server
SetClanCharacterMessage
The SetClanCharacterMessage record models a message containing the choice of a student's clan to use on a character card
SingleIslandController
Class SingleIslandController manages and populates the scene showing a single island, which corresponds to the file singleIsland.fxml.
StepsCharacterCard
The StepsCharacterCard class models the character cards that have an impact on the calculus of the maximum number of steps that Mother Nature can take
StudentContainer
The StudentContainer interface contains the necessary methods for managing additions and deletions of students in the objects that contain them
StudentMoverCharacterCard
The StudentMoverCharacterCard class models the character cards that move students between objects
TowerColor
The TowerColor class is an enumeration with the list of the available tower colors in the game
Turn
The Turn class contains the main logic for the managing of the turns and their phases, with the attributes and methods needed; it's tightly connected with the Game class
TurnState
The TurnState class is an enumeration with the list of the phases of a turn
UpdateCharacterCard
 
UpdateChosenCard
 
UpdateCloud
 
UpdateCloudManager
 
UpdateGamePhase
 
UpdateIsland
 
UpdateIslandManager
 
UpdateMessage
UpdateMessage is an interface the comprehends messages sent to the client following an update in the model
UpdateMotherNaturePosition
 
UpdatePlayer
 
View
 
WaitingRoomController
WaitingRoomController displays the Waiting Room on GUI
WrongGamePhaseException
The WrongGamePhaseException is thrown when a move is invoked in the wrong game phase
WrongPlayerException
The WrongPlayerException is thrown when any player except the current one tries to make a move
WrongTurnPhaseException
The WrongTurnPhaseException is thrown when a move is invoked in the wrong turn phase
